welcome.title: Welcome to LibreHousehold
welcome.text: Let's set up your household to help you manage tasks and expenses.

card_1.title: Manage Tasks
card_1.description: Easily assign and track household chores.

card_2.title: Track shared expenses
card_2.description: Split costs and see who owes what.

card_3.title: View spending statistic
card_3.description: Analyze your household's spending habits over time.

create_step.title: Create your household
create_step.text: Give your household a name and optionally upload an image.
create_step.household_name_error: Enter a household name with at least three characters.

create_account_step.title: Set up your account
create_account_step.text: As the creator, you'll be the admin of your household.
create_account_step.admin_name_error: Enter a name with at least three characters.
